data_usage: Values of average Texas summer temperature vs precipitation were displayed on a scatter plot, for each year from 1895-2012.
methodology: Seasonal average values of temperature and precipitation for Texas were calculated from annual data, for the period 1895-2012. Summer values of temperature vs precipitation were then displayed on a scatter plot for each year, with data points for select years subsequently changed to a different color. The 2011 data point was also increased in size to highlight the record heat and drought that occurred that year.
notes: IDL was used to perform numerical calculations and Microsoft Excel was used to visualize the data.
output_artifacts:
tx.ave.prcp
tx.ave.tave
texas_tave_prcp_scatter.pro
tx.summary.prcp.txt
tx.summary.tave.txt

software: IDL (version 8.0); Microsoft Excel for Mac 2011 Version 14.3.9 (131030)
